name: Wanz Upon A Time (IGJam 10 Entry)
description:
The goal is to jump into the portal and thus reach the next level. The bug can only jump and release its body parts in the air in order to block the gears.

Source Code
  • Download: https://github.com/BrutalHack/igjam10
  • License: GPL v3
Technology used

Unity, Photoshop, Jetbrains Rider, Git

Help / Controls

Main move is to fling the bug "angrybirds-style".

If the bug is in the air, you can click to drop a part of its body (it has 6 parts).

'R' = restart

'ESC' = close the game

Game Jam
  • InnoGames Jam 10
  • Theme: Time Cheating
  • Time: 45 hours
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Code)
  • Sergej Tihonov (Code)
  • Eike Wulff (Code)
  • Stefanie Curth (Art)
